meanings.definition: The act of converting a process or task into one that is performed by robots.
meanings.sent1: The robotizations of the assembly line increased efficiency.
meanings.sent2: In the factory, robotizations have replaced manual labor.
meanings.sent3: The robotizations at the grocery store made the checkout process faster.
meanings.sent4: Her kitchen was a symphony of robotizations, with appliances doing all the work.
meanings.sent5: The robotizations in the warehouse made it look like a scene from a sci-fi movie.

meanings.definition: The state of being automated or mechanized.
meanings.sent1: Robotizations have revolutionized the manufacturing industry.
meanings.sent2: The company embraced robotizations to streamline their operations.
meanings.sent3: The robotizations in the house made daily chores a breeze.
meanings.sent4: His office was a testament to the wonders of robotizations.
meanings.sent5: The robotizations in the city made it feel like a futuristic utopia.
